rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with a reception area adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with natural light, Scandinavian style minimalism and comfortable seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Modular dining space adjacent to the kitchen for social gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, fully-equipped Scandinavian kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and ample storage.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with adjoining bathroom ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated fitness area designed with luxury finishes, ventilation, and natural light.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet study and reading space with built-in bookshelves, ample lighting, and comfortable seating.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Storage and utility room for housekeeping essentials.

openings.features: Wide glass door providing natural light and aesthetic appeal.
Large floor-to-ceiling windows for ample daylighting and scenic views.
Open balcony space leading to private garden area, offering a sense of outdoor connectivity.
Access point to rooftop terrace ensuring ease of movement.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with an en-suite bathroom, private balcony and ample storage.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom designed for additional family members.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Well-lit bedroom with modern fixtures and ample storage.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom maintaining the Scandinavian design aesthetic.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom attached to Master Bedroom, featuring modern fixtures and luxury finishes.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: Functional workspace with natural lighting for family use.

rooms.name: Balcony Area
rooms.description: Small balcony attached to Master Bedroom enhancing the living experience.

openings.features: Well-designed staircase providing access between floors with safety features.
Door leading to the rooftop terrace ensuring easy mobility.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive outdoor space with Scandinavian minimalist design, furnished with seating and lighting for relaxation and gatherings.

rooms.name: Private Lounge
rooms.description: Cozy area on the rooftop with a retractable awning for weather protection.

openings.features: Secure and accessible staircase leading to the terrace.
Designated area for maintenance equipment and utilities.
